author: abdel.stark
content: I deployed 4 Geth nodes on the testnet. The testnet now have 4 Besu nodes and 4 Geth nodes

author: abdel.stark
content: Currently the testnet has 83 millions Ethereum accounts. I will generate more until we have 100M accounts. Then I will start generating entries in state storage using a smart contract

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Awhile back it seemed like the RLP format for EIP-1559/EIP-2718 was still a bit in flux, has that settled down now?  I don't see any reference to the actual RLP encoding of these transactions in the EIP anymore, was it moved elsewhere or still needs to be formally defined?  For example there was mention of the actual RLP format in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/2812/files#diff-c7a67afc8ee3b0ff2a29ddb3cecd13fe0ce30f3c96def22f117456987f6a50a2R88 but I don't see that section in the EIP anymore.

author: timbeiko
content: <@!388751025789468672> I think <@!301186049323958275> is working on a PR for that, but it will follow the 2718 scheme. The number it will have is still TBD.
